answers.answer: Sprijin de Urgență provides resources, food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, and volunteers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: One can request help on Sprijin de Urgență by requesting resources.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: ICF Gloria from Odessa, Ukraine, in partnership with Adra Ukraine, organizes evacuation buses from Odessa.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Evacuation buses from Odessa to Palanka'.

answers.answer: Evacuation buses from Odessa operate every Monday and Thursday.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Evacuation buses from Odessa to Palanka'.

answers.answer: The United Nations Refugee Agency (UNHCR) and the International Organization for Migration (IOM) offer free transfer to Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Free transfer from Ukraine to Romania via Moldova'.

answers.answer: Buses depart from the Palanca border in Moldova to Huși in Romania, where aid is available, and volunteers assist with transfers to Bucharest or Iasi.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Free transfer from Ukraine to Romania via Moldova'.

answers.answer: Rescue 4x4 provides free public service for rescue, recovery, and emergency interventions, including bringing vehicles to a usable road or removing them from public carriageways.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Rescue 4x4'.

answers.answer: The content indicates a general option to 'Request help' for Rescue 4x4 services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Rescue 4x4'.

answers.answer: Transport options in Romania include trains, buses/maxi taxis, taxis, and the subway.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Transport in Romania'.

answers.answer: The Romanian government does not cover transportation costs.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Transport in Romania'.

answers.answer: One can find Romanian train routes and timetables from major railway operators via their websites such as cfrcalatori.ro and mersultrenurilor.infofer.ro.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Train info'.

answers.answer: Romanian train tickets can be bought via websites like cfrcalatori.ro.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Train info'.

answers.answer: One can find Romanian bus and maxitaxi routes and timetables from major operators via websites such as autogari.ro and mersulautobuzelor.ro.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Bus/maxi taxi info'.

answers.answer: To buy a Romanian bus pass, one needs a passport or other identity documents.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Bus/maxi taxi info'.

answers.answer: It is recommended not to hail a cab but instead use apps like Free Now, Uber, or Bolt to take a ride in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Taxi'.

answers.answer: Available taxi apps in Romania include Free Now, Uber, and Bolt.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Taxi'.

answers.answer: One can pay for Romanian subway travel by buying a ticket at the metro station ticket office or by paying with a bank card directly at the turnstile.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the section under 'Traveling by subway'.

answers.answer: One can top up transport cards online via online.stbsa.ro.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/transportation and read the page carefully.
